document.full_text: fatigue had been the biggest reason for the premature exit from the playoffs by the nba champion los angeles lakers, all-star guard kobe bryant said on wednesday.
document.title: fatigue the main factor behind lakers letdown, says bryant
lines_and_colors: fatigue had been the biggest reason for the premature exit from the playoffs by the nba champion los angeles lakers, all-star guard kobe bryant said on wednesday.
